TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder`1<- T>

Docs.typeparam: The type of values being set by the animation being constructed.
Docs.summary: An interface for an animation builder using normalized keyframes.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder<in T> ExpressionKeyFrame (double progress, string expression, Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType easingType = Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType.Default, Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode easingMode = Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder`1<!T> ExpressionKeyFrame(float64 progress, string expression, valuetype Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType easingType, valuetype Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode easingMode) cil managed

Public Function ExpressionKeyFrame (progress As Double, expression As String, Optional easingType As EasingType = Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType.Default, Optional easingMode As EasingMode = Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut) As INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder(Of In T)

Docs.param: The normalized progress for the keyframe (must be in the [0, 1] range).
The expression for the new keyframe to add.
The easing type to use to reach the new keyframe.
The easing mode to use to reach the new keyframe.
Docs.summary: Adds a new normalized expression keyframe to the builder in use. This method can only be used when the animation being built targets the composition layer.
Docs.returns: The same instance that the method was invoked upon.
Docs.exception: Thrown when the animation being built targets the XAML layer.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder<in T> KeyFrame (double progress, T value, Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType easingType = Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType.Default, Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode easingMode = Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut);

Public Function KeyFrame (progress As Double, value As T, Optional easingType As EasingType = Microsoft.Toolkit.Uwp.UI.Animations.EasingType.Default, Optional easingMode As EasingMode = Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseInOut) As INormalizedKeyFrameAnimationBuilder(Of In T)

Docs.param: The normalized progress for the keyframe (must be in the [0, 1] range).
The value for the new keyframe to add.
The easing type to use to reach the new keyframe.
The easing mode to use to reach the new keyframe.
Docs.summary: Adds a new normalized keyframe to the builder in use.
Docs.returns: The same instance that the method was invoked upon.
